lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown pardoned Robert Downey Jr. on Thursday for a nearly 20-year-old felony drug conviction that led to the actor’s imprisonment for roughly a year.

headline.main: California: Robert Downey Jr. Granted a Pardon
headline.print_headline: California: Robert Downey Jr. Granted a Pardon

snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown pardoned Robert Downey Jr. on Thursday for a nearly 20-year-old felony drug conviction that led to the actor’s imprisonment for roughly a year.
